name: Clan of Crocodiles
description:
A baby Crocodile rises from the swamps of the African bush. What's happened to his family? Its up to you to find them. You must take care of him, feed him, help him rebuild his lost family. This young reptile is last remaining member of the legendary Kwena Family. It is up to you to help him rebuild his family by finding new members. Since the great defeat of the Kwena Clan, other competing croc families have taken control. The goal of the game is to regain control and rule the territory again. Victory will be yours!

Help this fast and powerful reptile navigate the wild safari landscape and fight against Cheetahs, Hyenas, Elephants, Lions, Rhinos, Leopards, snakes and other dangerous animals. This high action animal simulator will keep you on the edge of your seat. But this is no ordinary animal simulator . . .

In Clan of Crocodiles, you enter into a world of both magic and epic adventure. Your croc will unlock special magical spells as you locate various magical spell books. These special abilities include: lighting bolt, invincibility, fireball, and healing . It is these magic elements that make this game very unique and, we believe, best in class for animal simulator games.

The game is part role playing game, part animal simulation, and part adventure game. It will take you on an ultimate epic journey as you build your new home, build your great warrior clan, use your magic skills, survive against enemies that attack, clash with 4 enemy clans, and ultimately defeat all 6 Super Bosses. Please Note : The 3D graphics are very processor intensive. For optimal game performance, it is best to restart your device before playing. This game will work better on powerful devices.


Top Game Features:
-- Part Animal Survival and part RPG
-- Dynamic weather including thunderstorms storms
-- Realistic Safari 3D Landscape
-- Leopard , Lion, Crocodile, Hyena, Rhino, Elephant, and Snake enemies
-- 4 Enemy Families to defeat
-- 6 Super Giant Ultra Bosses
-- 4 Magic Spells to unlock - Fireball, Invincibility, Lightning Bolt, and Healing
-- Dynamic Time of Day - Sunrise to Sunset


Helpful Tips:

1. Use the Mini Map in the top right corner of the screen to help you find things on the map.

2. You may also seek advice from your spirit guide - a ghostlike figure sitting near your home.

3. As you defeat the bosses, more bosses will appear. All the enemies are not shown on the map in the beginning of the game. The more you play, the more enemies will appear.

4. Find all the magic books to unlock the magical skills including: Healing Potion, Fireball, Lightning Bolt, and Invincibility.

5. Earn adventure points by hunting and completing tasks. Use the points to upgrade your strength, stamina, and magic.

6. Use the Call button to call the family members when you need help against the enemies as you race across the huge Wild Safari open 3D world. Bosses include Snakes, Lion, Crocodile, Hyena, Cheetah, and Hippo. This is ultimate animal simulation like you have never seen it.
